name: .WAM File Extension
summary: Learn about .WAM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Mission file used by Worms Armageddon, a turn-based game that revolves around defeating opposing worms; stores settings that make up a mission, such as weapon options, environment behavior, available ammunition, and enemy team difficulty.

content: NOTE: WAM files are located in the \​worms\​data\​mission game directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
